Name: Once upon a time
About the game: « Once upon a time » is an adventure game in which a young woman, finds a magic book and is instantly teleported inside. « Tom Thumb », « Little red riding hood », « Rapunzel », « Puss in boots » and many other fairy tales collected by the French writer Charles Perrault and the Brothers Grimm will be part of the adventure. Each chapter of the book is one single tale in which you will have to solve riddles in fairy tale designed settings. Magic and nature will be friends and foes. Pay attention to your surroundings for many objects will help you out. Being a fan of « Monkey Island » and other « point & click », i created riddles that you will solve if you persevere and use your sense of logic. The game is under development, the introduction (Cathedral) is available early in the year and the first tale (Tom Thumb) will be released in 2018. About the developer : I am an independant developer, I am alone in this adventure and i look forward your taking part in this adventure. Don’t hesitate to share with me your own idea.
